amount.description: The amount of exhaustion to apply to the player.
amount.markdownDescription: The amount of exhaustion to apply to the player.

type.description:
## Exhaust

---


[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/exhaust)

Applies exhaustion to the entity, reducing saturation and hunger.

Type ID: `origins:exhaust`



---

### üìù Note

__This entity action type will only work on players.__



---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:exhaust",
    "amount": 0.4
}
```

This example will apply 0.4 exhaustion to the player, which is similar in effect to jumping 8 times (without sprinting).

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Exhaust (Entity Action Type) date: 2021-04-05

Exhaust

Entity Action Type

Applies exhaustion to the entity, reducing saturation and hunger.

Type ID: origins:exhaust

!!! note

**This entity action type will only work on players.**

Fields

Field Type Default Description
amount Float The amount of exhaustion to apply to the player.

Examples

"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:exhaust",
    "amount": 0.4
}

This example will apply 0.4 exhaustion to the player, which is similar in effect to jumping 8 times (without sprinting).
